title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: The process was easy, they contacted me and set the interview online, they were 3 One had the general questions The other two had the situational questions They were nice but unfortunately I didn’t get a job offer and i fail to know why to this point.
Interview Questions: The interview was simple. First they asked me what do i know about crs, what’s my previous job experience, why do i want to work with crs .. Second part was situational What would you do if you had a conflict with a colleague? What would you do if you’re in a session and the break is soon and the meals haven’t arrived yet? How would you reply if someone wants to ask a question in the middle of the session?

title: Programmer Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services
Interview Descriptions: I don’t consider the hiring process very professional. First interview was virtual for 30 min. Then with a panel of 3. After 6 weeks of no reply I get a request for a written assignment. Then NO reply at all, and NO reply to my reminding emails!
Interview Questions: Very simple and straightforward technical, leadership and safeguarding questions.

title: Project Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services
Interview Descriptions: Test then interview. It was a situational interview based on the job description. Includes questions about leadership, team spirit, decision making process . I took around 45 minutes and it was panel of three people.
Interview Questions: Why you are a unique candidate for this position?

title: Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services
Interview Descriptions:
During COVID, so it was held online.
Attendees were: My direct supervisor (project manager) and another in her similar position in the same department but for another team and the program manager was just an observer.
Questions revolved around skills, situations and few technicalities.
Interview Questions:
Describe a conflict at work and how did you solve it?
How will you deal with the beneficiaries in different situations like (.....)?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: At the beginning I sent my C.V and cover letter then received a phone call 2 weeks  later and at first there was a technical test for mathematical skills and Microsoft office knowledge then one month later an interview,
Interview Questions: The challenges that will meet you in this position, describe how your previous work experience and education level meet the requirements of this position.

title: Intern - Hourly Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Easy, normal HR question. the only con is the short notice contact before the interview. they called me a day before the interview. but the interview overall was okay. the interviewers were professional & friendly.
Interview Questions:
How do you handle stress?
Time management related questions

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: I applied online for education and grants program and i was called after 3 weeks to go foe an interview. I was interviewed by 3 friendly workers.  The acceptance mail was sent after the interview with 3 days
Interview Questions: Does and don't in interacting with refugees

title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services
Interview Descriptions: Apply online on the website career section , Invitation to Technical written  test after passing the test , Invitation to interview , after accepted in the interview , they send job offer if accepted they start hiring.
Interview Questions: Whats your information about CRS activities ?

title: Finance Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: first the were test the they called for interview .The interview was about managerial skills  and technical skills . this interview also is describe what the job need and measure if I'm qualified to fill it or not

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Catholic Relief Services (Al `Ajūzah) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Comprehensive skills test
Face to face interview with 2 program managers + HR member
Face to face interview with head of programming 

The very funny thing that these interviews was not consistent and it took me around 2 months between every interview and another and 6 months for the final feedback which is not accepted
Interview Questions:
Situational question 
Experience questions 
Case study
Write reports
